package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: NumPy Multidimensional array facility
package-manager.description:
The fundamental package needed for scientific computing with Python is called NumPy. This package contains: * a powerful N-dimensional array object * sophisticated (broadcasting) functions * basic linear algebra functions * basic Fourier transforms * sophisticated random number capabilities * tools for integrating Fortran code.
NumPy derives from the old Numeric code base and can be used as a replacement for Numeric. It also adds the features introduced by Numarray and can also be used to replace Numarray.
